title: Design & Automate Icon Library with Figma
description: I talk about how I create and automate icon library and some takeaways from it. This talk presented in Friends of Figma Jakarta.

title: Thinking in Code for Designer
description: Explore the world of code from a designer's perspective and how it can enhance creative process.

title: Introduction to User Experience Design
description: I talk about the fundamental and how to get started in User Experience Design field.

title: Careers 101: Prepare to applying jobs or intern
description: Explore essential preps for successful job and internship applications. This talk presented in Jagongan Stematel, my high school community.

title: Easily Structure & Communicate Ideas using Wireframe
description: I talk some tips how to create a wireframes and discover how they can be a tool for idea development and execution.

title: Designing with Data: Using A/B Testing to Help Improve User Experience
description: Get to know the potential of A/B testing in product development and understand its role in creating impactful user experiences.

title: Designing Experience and Interface
description: I talk about some fundamental how to design experience and interface in building product.

title: Craft Solution using Design Thinking
description: Lead a workshop on design thinking, guiding participants from problem solving to crafting solutions.

title: Building Instagram-like Prototype using Framer
description: I facilitate a hands-on workshop where participants learn to create interactive prototypes resembling Instagram using Framer. This talk presented while doing intern at Bukalapak.

title: Be Awesome with Git
description: Lead a workshop on how to use Git for version control and collaboration in software development projects. This talk presented while in college for database laboratory in Telkom University.
